title: IdealMono anyone?
content:
Looking for a font called IdealMono and where this typeface can be purchased. Anyone know?

 [‹ Century Gothic as a body text](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045832/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32474 "Go to previous forum topic") [How bad is $14 an hour for a FT design job? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045832/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32463 "Go to next forum topic")
